Description:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ARMA 3 has absorbed all the best from previous games in the series and has introduced many innovations . A new physics engine allows the player with unprecedented realism to control the fighting . A new model of behavior technology , a wide range of weapons , have become classics of M16 and AK74 to prototypes, not yet released into wide use , as well as fans of the series a welcome opportunity to swim under water.
Storyline:
Survive, Adapt, Win

After years of grueling war , Europe has become the last refuge of the weakened NATO forces in battles . Stratis island captured by the enemy from the Middle East and it will win guaranteed the superiority of NATO in the region. Operation has begun , " Magnitude " : a small group of specially trained soldiers with scientists sent undercover to the island in the Mediterranean Sea . Mission in danger of collapse ! The team is almost completely destroyed, and the main character, Captain Scott Miller washed ashore enemy island. Complete the operation in his power , but his way there are the dangers of modern warfare , ruthless environment and the numerical superiority of the enemy . Have to think about every step!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
